sys_script_include.name: EmailVerificationAJAX

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_6e0340632f341510f98fa55df699b617
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_842885_country_m.EmailVerificationAJAX</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>EmailVerificationAJAX</name><script><![CDATA[var EmailVerificationAJAX = Class.create();
EmailVerificationAJAX.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    verifyEmail: function() {
        var email = this.getParameter('sysparm_email');
        var pattern = /^(([^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+(\.[^<>()\[\]\\.,;:\s@"]+)*)|(".+"))@((\[[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}\.[0-9]{1,3}])|(([a-zA-Z\-0-9]+\.)+[a-zA-Z]{2,}))$/gm;
        if (pattern.test(email)) {
            return true;
        } else {
            return false;
        }
    },
    type: 'EmailVerificationAJAX'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-07-25 19:54:45</sys_created_on><sys_id>6e0340632f341510f98fa55df699b617</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>EmailVerificationAJAX</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Country Management" source="x_842885_country_m">5b303f1f2fb01510f98fa55df699b6eb</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Country Management">5b303f1f2fb01510f98fa55df699b6eb</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_6e0340632f341510f98fa55df699b617</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-25 20:16:39</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
